SELECT t.id, t.name, t.course_type AS courseType, t.credit, (select d.dict_value from t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code='COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code=t.course_type) AS courseTypeName, (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(e.`name`) FROM t_teacher e INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON e.id = ct.teacher_id WHERE ct.course_id = t.id ) AS teachersName, (select count(*) from t_student_course sc WHERE sc.course_id=t.id) studentNum FROM t_course t WHERE 1=1
AND t.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT c.id, c. NAME, t.id teacherId, t. NAME teachersName, c.credit, ( SELECT d.dict_value FROM t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code = 'COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = c.course_type ) AS courseTypeName FROM t_teacher t INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON t.id = ct.teacher_id INNER JOIN t_course c ON ct.course_id = c.id AND c.id not in (select sc.course_id from t_student_course sc INNER JOIN t_student s ON sc.student_id = s.id and s.id=#{studentId}) ORDER BY c.credit DESC

SELECT c.id, c. NAME, t.id teacherId, t. NAME teachersName, c.credit, ( SELECT d.dict_value FROM t_sys_dict d WHERE d.dict_type_code = 'COURSE_TYPE' AND d.dict_code = c.course_type ) AS courseTypeName FROM t_teacher t INNER JOIN t_course_teacher ct ON t.id = ct.teacher_id INNER JOIN t_course c ON ct.course_id = c.id AND c.id in (select sc.course_id from t_student_course sc INNER JOIN t_student s ON sc.student_id = s.id and s.id=#{studentId}) ORDER BY c.credit DESC
